name: Retro Blitz
description:
Portfolio Website: http://travisenglandhewlett.wordpress.com

First Engines Project, FDSC Games Design & Development Level 4 

Developed From: 21st September 2020 – 22nd January 2021 

Developed by: Travis England-Hewlett 

Retro Blitz is a time attack FPS shooter with a retro arcade visual theme. Set on a space station you as the player are against the clock to accumulate as many points as possible by shooting the colourful orbs spread throughout the level, but be cautious of your health which is decreasing perpetually. With the orbs spawning randomly it occasionally makes sense to venture into the vortex tunnel to quickly accumulate points.

Sourced Audio: 

Music/Effects: Gamemaster Audio, 2017. Retro 8Bit Sounds. [online] Unreal Engine. Available at: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketpl... [Accessed 21 September 2020].
